oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Dr. King Had a Premonition That His Career Was Ending"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; King, Martin Luther, Jr.; speeches; assassinations;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Article reporting on the speech made by King the night before his assassination with the context of his assassination.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Mary B. Clark
